In a quiet garden, there lived a snail named Speedy. Unlike his sluggish peers, Speedy had a dream: to become the fastest snail in the world. Every day, he practiced on a winding leaf racetrack, challenging the gentle breeze to keep up. One fateful morning, a butterfly announced a grand race at the edge of the garden. Snails from far and wide gathered, but Speedy, with his heart racing, knew he had to try. As the race began, he surprised everyone, gliding gracefully, leaving trails of shimmering dew. To his astonishment, he crossed the finish line first, proving that speed comes in all forms.
